dairyCompany.description: The dairy company that processes the milk.

dairyCompanyIdentifier.description:
Within the scope of this data exchange, unique identifier of this dairy company.
In the Netherlands: Fabrieksnummer.

items.description: The option to add an extra, secondary, identifier of this dairy company, e.g. a GLN.

dairyCompanyMilkCharacteristicLine.description:
Key figure determined by the dairy company that is applicable for the dairy company as a whole and are not specific for individual dairy farms.
E.g.: average for a specific period for a specific dairy plant.

companyCharacteristicCodeListId.description: Identifier of the code list that is used for this company characteristic. For The Netherlands, AgroConnect code list nl.cl780 is to be used.

companyCharacteristicCodeStatute.description: Indicates whether it concerns regular (REG) milk or organic (BIO) milk.

companyCharacteristicCodeType.description: Code referring to a key figure that is applicable for the dairy company as a whole and is not specific for individual dairy farms. For The Netherlands, AgroConnect code list nl.cl780 is to be used.

companyCharacteristicCodeUnit.description: Unit of measurement for a key figure that is applicable for the dairy company as a whole and is not specific for individual dairy farms. For UoM AgroConnect code list nl.cl020 is used.

companyCharacteristicCodeValue.description: Value of a key figure that is applicable for the dairy company as a whole and is not specific for individual dairy farms.

dairyCompanyMilkCharacteristics.description:
Key figures determined by the dairy company that are applicable for the dairy company as a whole and are not specific for individual dairy farms.
E.g.: averages for a specific period for a specific dairy plant.

month.description: A specific month within the year these key figures apply to.

year.description: The year these key figures apply to.

data.description: The root of the hierarchical structured data set.

partyIdType.description: Standard data segment for the unique identifier of a party.

id.description: The value of the party identifier.

scheme.description: Indicator of what type of identifier is used to identify the party. E.g., a GLN, KvK, customer ID, etc.
